El Sherif malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 2003 na 7 Playing cards
Mgbe ahụ ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Open your eyes (2005), On low heat (2005), Agent 1001 (2005), Cinderella (2006) na Halim (2006)
O meela ihe nkiri na The End of The World n'afọ 2006
N'afọ 2007, onye nduzi Youssef Chahine họọrọ El Sherif ka ọ sonye na ihe nkiri ikpeazụ ya tupu ọnwụ ya Le Chaos

El Sherif rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ọtụtụ usoro TV kemgbe 2011, nke mbụ Citizen X na 2011, mgbe ahụ Private Number n'afọ 2012, Temporary Name n'afọ 2013, The Hunter n'afọ 2014, The Devil's Game n'afọ 2015, The Caesar na 2016 na Kafr Delhab n'afọ 2017
Ọ laghachiri na sinima n'afọ 2018 na ihe nkiri Sons Of Adam

mgbe ahụ ọ hapụrụ afọ atọ nke ihe nkiri telivishọn, mana ọ laghachiri site na usoro ihe nkiri televishọn sayensị sayensị nke mbụ nke Ijipt The End in Ramadan na 2020, nke Ministri Na-ahụ Maka Mba Ọzọ nke Israel katọrọ usoro ahụ n'ihi na ọ na-ebu amụma mbibi Israel.
Aha ọmụmụ ya bụ Mohamed Ismail Naji
A mụrụ ya na Cairo, na Septemba 14 1978, nna ya na-arụ ọrụ na ndị agha. Ọ gbara bọọlụ na obere otu Al-Ahly, mana o merụrụ ahụ tupu ọ gaa na otu mbụ, nke mere ka ọ ghara ịga n'ọgbọ egwuregwu

Mgbe ahụ ọ gara rụọ ọrụ na ngalaba mgbasa ozi wee gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Faculty of Engineering, Ain Shams University, Department of Mechanics na 2002. N'afọ 2009, Youssef El-Sherif lụrụ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke magazin Euphoria, Engy Alaa, ha nwekwara ụmụ atọ: ejima Abdelrahman na Abdallah yana Jana.

N'afọ 2004, onye nduzi Sharif Sabry họọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na nke mbụ ya na kaadị 7 Playing ma họrọ aha nka maka ya, "Youssef El Sherif". Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o sonyere na Open your eyes, Agent 1001 na Cinderella n'afọ 2005, ebe ọ gosipụtara àgwà nke onye nduzi Ali Badrakhan
Ruo mgbe onye nduzi Youssef Chahine họọrọ ya n'afọ 2007 ka ọ sonye na ihe nkiri ikpeazụ ya tupu ọnwụ ya Le Chaos
O sonyere na Venice Film Festival na nnọkọ nke 51 nke London International Film Festival.
Youssef El Sherif kwuru ihe karịrị otu ugboro n'ọtụtụ ajụjụ ọnụ telivishọn na ọ na-etinye ọnọdụ na nkwekọrịta azụmahịa ya site n'inyeghị "ihe nkiri anwụrụ ọkụ"
O kwuru, sị: "Enweghị m obi iru ala, ma ọ bụ chọpụta na ọ dị mma maka m, inwe ihe nkiri na-esi ísì ụtọ, dịka ọmụmaatụ, site na isusu ọnụ ma ọ bụ ijide
Enweghị m mmetụta na ọ bụ ihe ziri ezi site n'echiche m, ana m amanye nke a na ndụ m na naanị onwe m
